content:
MAN: (mockingly) I doubt it.

He raises his gun, ready to shoot. But before he can, there's the sound of a gunshot, and the man falls to the ground, dead.

CUT TO:

EXT. NEW YORK CITY - DAY

Reese and Sarah are standing outside the library, surrounded by FBI agents.

AGENT: (nodding) Good work, Mr. Reese. We'll take it from here.

RESE: (nodding) Thanks. And be careful. There are still more of them out there.

The agents nod, and they start to take the remaining members of the group into custody.

CUT TO:

INT. FINCH'S LIBRARY - DAY

Finch and Laura are sitting in the library, surrounded by the wreckage of the fight. They're both shaken, but unharmed.

FINCH: (softly) I'm sorry, Miss Miller. I never intended for you to get caught up in all of this.

LAURA: (gently) It's okay, Mr. Finch. I'm just glad we're both safe.

Finch nods, his eyes filled with gratitude.

FINCH: (sincerely) Thank you, Mr. Reese. You saved our lives today.

Reese nods, his eyes warm.

RESE: (softly) It's what I do.

There's a moment of silence, and then Finch looks up.

FINCH: (firmly) But this isn't over. There are still people out there who need our help. And we're the only ones who can give it to them.

Reese and Sarah both nod, their eyes shining with determination.

RESE: (firmly) Then let's get started.

FADE TO BLACK.
